front.title: Design and configuration of the smart manufacturing systems test bed

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: The purpose of this document is to describe the design and configuration of the NIST Smart Manufacturing Systems Test Bed. Prospective developers, technical-assessment personnel, researchers, and interested end-users are the intended audience of this document. This document will provide a high-level overview of the SMS Test Bed and direct the reader to additional documentation to support fully using and replicated the SMS Test Bed.
